ygData.subject: Re: [_EQ_Magic] Druid Magic
ygData.msgSnippet: snare, ward summon.. and then head to lava ... unless you just want to take on some crocs in oasis.. OR.. if you have kunark.. head to the lake of Ill Omen..
ygData.messageBody:
snare, ward summon.. and then head to lava ... unless you just want to take
on some crocs in oasis.. OR.. if you have kunark.. head to the lake of Ill
Omen.. that place rocks for my 14 druid.. hard sometimes, but I can kite
some reds there..
----- Original Message -----
From: "Michael Rhodes" <mrhodes@...>
To: <_EQ_Magic@egroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, November 23, 2000 10:34 AM
Subject: [_EQ_Magic] Druid Magic


> Hi Everyone...
> I'm not sure how people are on this list, I even forgot that I was on it
> until the last thread showed up!
>
> My question is this: I have a lvl 16 Druid, and I'm up to date on all my
> spells, but I often don't use them like I should. Does anyone out there
> have any tips on what spells are good for soloing? Another unrelated
> question..... Does anyone here know where a good place to hunt solo would
> be? I'm having a difficult time finding decent places to go without
getting
> killed.
>
> Thanks for an tips in advance...
>
> Mike
>
> Kyena 16th Circle
> The Nameless
